meanings.definition: The sound a baby makes when crying.
meanings.sent1: The baby's waah echoed through the room.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud waah coming from the nursery.
meanings.sent3: The waah of the baby made everyone rush to comfort him.
meanings.sent4: The waah of the newborn was like a melody of innocence.
meanings.sent5: The piercing waah of the infant pierced my heart.

meanings.sent1: She would waah whenever she was upset.
meanings.sent2: The child began to waah after dropping his ice cream.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but waah when I watched the sad movie.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds seemed to waah as the rain poured down.
meanings.sent5: His waahing could be heard throughout the entire neighborhood.
